Title: RMS: How to update your Personal Profile
Body:
Opening your Personal Profile

Click the "Login" link in the upper right corner:

Enter your username (normally your email address) and password, and click "Login":

After successfully logging in, click the "Profile" link in the upper right corner:

Updating your basic details

Verify the information displayed on the Person Details tab. If necessary, make corrections, and then click "Save":

Updating your contact information

Move to the Contacts tab, and verify the information displayed.

The Contacts section lists the contact details of yourself, whilst the Emergency Contacts section lists the contact details of persons that shall be contacted in case something happens to you:

Use the "Add" button of the respective section to add new contact information, and/or update any information as needed. You can either use the "Edit" button to open the row in a form, or you can click directly on the detail you want to change:

Please make sure you keep this information up-to-date at all times.

Updating your ID document data

Move to the ID tab to see your registered ID documents:

Use the "Add Identity" button to open a form to register another ID document, enter the details and then click "Save".

Updating your Physical Description Details

Please make sure the information on the Description tab is correct:

Updating your Address

You can enter your current address(es) on the Address tab. Please verify that the information on that tab is correct and up-to-date.

Logout

Do not forget to log out from RMS:

Privacy Information

The information you provide in your Personal Profile will be accessible for authorized staff members of your National Society and the IFRC.

If you are an RDRT roster member, your personal details will be accessible for RDRT Administrators and mission managers. Contact information (email address, mobile phone number) will also be used by an automated system to send you RDRT alerts.

Your personal details in RMS will not be shared publicly at any time.
